changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Trigger to increment container utilisation when a position is occupied
changeSet.sql: create trigger os_incr_container_utilisation after insert on os_container_positions for each row begin update os_storage_containers set utilisation = utilisation + 1 where identifier = new.storage_container_id; end; //

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Trigger to decrement container utilisation when a position is vacated
changeSet.sql: create trigger os_decr_container_utilisation after delete on os_container_positions for each row begin update os_storage_containers set utilisation = utilisation - 1 where identifier = old.storage_container_id; end; //

changeSet.author: vpawar
changeSet.id: Trigger to update container utilisation when a position is updated
changeSet.sql:
create trigger os_chg_container_utilisation after update on os_container_positions for each row begin update os_storage_containers set utilisation = utilisation - 1 where identifier = old.storage_container_id;
update os_storage_containers set utilisation = utilisation + 1 where identifier = new.storage_container_id; end; //
